img_above_text:
![Jade Fang.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Jade_Fang.jpg)
To obtain the Jade Fang, you need to defeat Whiteclad Noble in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a battle against the enemy known as Whiteclad Noble. This encounter takes place in Bamboo Grove at Black Wind Mountain, where players must defeat Whiteclad Noble to obtain the Jade Fang. The image serves as a visual guide to aid players in identifying and strategizing against this specific enemy within the game. It is part of a larger guide that provides tips and locations for various items, weapons, armor, and other collectibles in "Black Myth: Wukong."
